conversations.description: User asks the AI to list all patents in the company's portfolio that will expire within the next 12 months.
User requests a calendar reminder for the upcoming payment deadline of a specific patent maintenance fee.
User wants to find recent competitor filings in the field of AI‑powered image recognition since January 2024.
User asks the AI to calculate the exact expiration date for a utility patent filed in 2015 with a term extension.
User asks for a licensing scorecard for a set of three core patents to assess their market potential.
User wants a markdown report summarizing upcoming expirations, competitor activity, and licensing opportunities.
User asks the AI to search the USPTO database for patents related to "quantum key distribution" filed by a specific assignee.
User requests the AI to monitor a rival's patent filings in the nanomaterials space and notify of any new publications.
User asks for a detailed view of the legal status and citation count of a particular granted patent.
User wants to schedule a reminder for the next provisional filing deadline for an upcoming invention.
User asks the AI to identify design patents in the portfolio that could be bundled for a strategic licensing deal.
User requests a comparison of filing dates versus grant dates across the portfolio to spot bottlenecks.
User wants the AI to flag any patents that are at risk of lapse due to missed maintenance fee payments.
User asks for a list of the top‑cited patents owned by a competitor in the automotive electronics field.
User requests a summary of new WIPO publications in the biotech sector that overlap with the company's research.
User wants to know which of their patents are eligible for Patent Term Extension under FDA regulations.
User asks the AI to find potential cross‑licensing partners based on overlapping technology keywords.
User requests the AI to generate a SWOT‑style strategic overview of the company's core patent assets.
User wants to set up a watch on a competitor's filings using the keywords "solid‑state battery" and receive weekly updates.
User asks the AI to retrieve full bibliographic details for a list of European patents.
User requests a timeline visualization of all patent grants and expirations for the next five years.
User wants to know the impact of recent court rulings on the enforceability of certain software patents in the portfolio.
User asks the AI to calculate maintenance fee amounts due for a group of patents over the next two years.
User requests a concise briefing of licensing opportunities in the renewable energy sector based on their patents.
User wants to prioritize which patents to renew by ranking them according to commercial relevance and citation strength.
User asks the AI to pull all patents assigned to a specific subsidiary and summarize their legal status.
User requests a draft of a licensing proposal document using the generated licensing scores as justification.
User wants to know if any of their patents have been cited by recent high‑impact scientific publications.
User asks the AI to monitor a competitor’s filings for any new applications in the field of autonomous drones.
User requests a list of patents that are eligible for accelerated examination under the USPTO Track One program.
User wants a reminder set for the upcoming deadline to submit evidence of use for a plant patent.
User asks the AI to generate a portfolio heat map highlighting regions with the highest concentration of active patents.
User requests a side‑by‑side comparison of two patents to assess potential overlap and infringement risk.
User wants to identify patents that have entered the public domain and could be used for open‑source projects.
User asks the AI to find licensing opportunities among patents that have a high number of forward citations.
User requests a custom report summarizing competitor activity in the CRISPR gene‑editing space.
User wants to schedule quarterly reviews of the portfolio’s expiration calendar.
User asks the AI to locate any pending applications that could extend the effective life of a core technology.
User requests the AI to calculate the total projected revenue loss if a set of key patents were to expire early.
User wants a concise briefing on the legal status of a patent family spanning US, EP, and WO jurisdictions.
User asks the AI to identify patents that could be bundled into a single licensing package for a specific industry.
User requests an alert when a competitor files a continuation‑in‑part of a previously published patent.
User wants to assess the licensing potential of a newly granted design patent in the consumer electronics market.
User asks the AI to retrieve the most recent examination reports for a set of pending applications.
User requests a strategic recommendation on whether to file a continuation for a high‑value provisional application.
User wants a reminder to submit a Request for Extension of Time to Respond to an Office Action.
User asks the AI to compile a list of patents that cite a particular foundational technology in the field of 5G.
User requests a markdown summary of upcoming maintenance fee windows for all US utility patents in the portfolio.
User wants to set up a watch on any new patents referencing a specific standard‑essential technology.
User asks the AI to generate a risk assessment report for potential infringement based on competitor filings.
User requests an overview of the patent landscape for a new product line the company is planning to launch.
